title: Flic En Flac Accommodation Offers Best Stay In Mauritius (evanalfie leo)
text: By evanalfie leo Jul 13, 2015 If you love beach holidays offering a pristine environment just checkout for the Mauritius tours that takes you through the paradise on earth with a backdrop of the palm-fringed beaches, coral reefs and turquoise sea. Mauritius located in the Indian Ocean is a volcanic island surrounded by wonderful beaches, coral reefs and lagoons along with spectacular waterfalls; black river gorges national park, rainforests, flower and fauna, huge craters etc for you to experience a wonderful holiday. There are many other famous tourist destinations in Mauritius apart from the beaches that you can visit like the Martello towers which is a landmark in the islands history, the largest game reserve on the island Yemen, the casela bird park which is inhabited by more than 120 bird species and the flower and fauna of Mauritius offering nature lovers the best time in their life.The Mauritius holiday rental services also offer you the best flic en flac accommodation for your comfortable stay on the islands so that you can relax and feel at home away from home on the distant land. The Mauritius accommodation offer both studio and two bedroom apartments for rent that you can checkout based on the number of people going to stay in the accommodation. The Mauritius self-catering accommodation comes with all facilities and features so that you can enjoy privacy and spend your day just like at home. The Mauritius apartment features living and dining room set, two bedroom with wardrobe and bed, tables and chairs, kitchen utensils and appliances, bed linen and towels provided, hot water service, laundry wash, air conditioning, telephone and TV etc that makes your life as comfortable as at home.The rates at the flic and flac accommodation are also quite affordable charging you charging you 29 euros for 1 to 14 in the studio apartments and 39 euros for the two bedroom apartments. You can book the accommodation for more than 22 days with special discounted rates applicable to spend a relaxed holiday in Mauritius. All you need is to just fill in the online form specifying your details and the number of days you would like to stay so that the apartment can be blocked for your visit. You can also go through a gallery of the Mauritius apartment for rent to have an idea on what you can expect on your arrival to the land. Airport pickup and dropping facility shall also be arranged if requested so that you can directly check-in to the hotel without any hassles on landing in Mauritius. With best Mauritius accommodation arranged for your arrival you can surely enjoy a beautiful holiday on the Island taking part in your favorite activities and appreciating the nature and beaches of Mauritius.
